surfit::matlabSparseMatrix Class Reference

Detailed Description

Matrices, inherited from matlabSparceMatrix can be saved into matlab binary file and then loaded in Matlab with "load" command.

See also:
http://www.mathworks.com/access/helpdesk/help/pdf_doc/matlab/matfile_format.pdf
